title: Oil Pump - Disassembly

body.body: The oil pump assembly consists of two scavenge pump assemblies at the rear and one pressure pump rotor assembly at the front.
To prevent the oil pump inner and outer rotors from becoming mixed, place the inner and outer rotors together in a marked container. The components must be refitted in their original positions.
Note the orientation and position of all components for assembly.
Remove the three fixings and the front end cap from the oil pump. Retain the three lock nuts for installation.

body.name: Oil pump front end cap B00901

body.body: Remove the oil pump rear end cap.
There is a recess in one end of the two scavenge pump rotors and the pressure pump rotor, the recess is to hold a dowel in position on the oil pump drive shaft.
Withdraw the rear scavenge pump rotor assembly. Keep the components of the rotor assembly together for assembly.
Remove the rear scavenge pump dowel from the oil pump drive shaft.
Remove the scavenge pump housing and the front scavenge pump rotor assembly. Keep the components of the rotor assembly together for assembly.
Note there is a washer between the front scavenge pump dowel and the scavenge pump housing for installation.
Remove the front scavenge pump dowel and the washer from the oil pump drive shaft.
Remove the oil pump pressure housing from the oil pump drive shaft.
Note that the oil pressure outer and inner rotors have a dot mark on one face for identification as they are slightly narrower when compared to the two scavenge rotors.
The oil pressure pump has the oil pressure valve fitted to it. Note its orientation for installation.
Remove the oil pressure pump rotor assembly and pressure pump end plate from the oil pump drive shaft. Collect the dowel and keep the components of the rotor assembly together for assembly.
